detailed_goals: Polish and refine the existing mechanics based on testing and feedback.
This includes bug fixing, balancing, and improving the overall player experience.
Document the implemented systems clearly.
Begin considering how these mechanics can be expanded upon for future features.
Refactor code for improved performance and maintainability.
Implement robust error handling and logging.
Document the implemented systems thoroughly.
Bug fixing and balancing of existing mechanics.
Iterate on player feedback to improve the overall experience.
Add polish to movement, combat, and UI elements.
Begin documenting systems with code comments and design documents.
Explore expanding on core mechanics with new features and abilities.
Final polish of all visual assets.
Creation of marketing materials (screenshots, trailers).
Iterate on visual feedback based on playtesting.
Bug fixing and refinement of character models and animations.
Optimize character assets for performance.
Optimization of environmental assets for performance.
Bug fixing and visual polish of the game world.
Creation of a cohesive and visually appealing game experience.
